title: Application complete
successParagraph1: We’ll email you when we've received your documents. We'll then review your application.
successParagraph2NoDocumentsRequired: You'll usually get the letter of administration within 16 weeks. It can take longer if you need to provide additional information.
successParagraph2: You’ll usually get the grant of probate within 16 weeks. It can take longer if you need to provide additional information.
successParagraph3: You don't need to do anything else now, we'll email you if we need more information.
successParagraph4: You can call HMCTS Probate on {helpLineNumber} if you have any questions.
successParagraph5: Find out what to do when you receive your grant of probate (opens in a new window).
survey: This is a new service â€“ your feedback will help us to improve it (opens in a new window).
saveParagraph1: You can save or print these documents for your reference.
